TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi UITypeEditor extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可用于设计值编辑器的基类，这些编辑器可提供用户界面 (UI) 以用来表示和编辑所支持的数据类型的对象值。

span.span: Provides a base class that can be used to design value editors that can provide a user interface (UI) for representing and editing the values of objects of the supported data types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个基类，你可以从派生该类并进行扩展，以实现设计时环境的自定义类型编辑器。The class provides a base class that you can derive from and extend to implement a custom type editor for the design-time environment. 通常，自定义类型编辑器与控件交互 。Typically, your custom type editor interacts with the control. 在文本框值编辑器不足以有效选择特定类型的值的情况下，自定义类型编辑器非常有用。Custom type editors are useful in situations where a text-box value editor is insufficient to effectively select the values of certain types. 若要实现自定义设计时 UI 类型编辑器，您必须执行以下步骤：To implement a custom design-time UI type editor, you must perform the following steps: - 定义一个从 派生的类。Define a class that derives from . - 重写 方法以处理用户界面、用户输入处理和值赋值。Override the method to handle the user interface, user input processing, and value assignment. - 重写 方法以通知属性窗口编辑器将使用的编辑器样式的类型。Override the method to inform the Properties window of the type of editor style that the editor will use. 通过执行以下步骤，可以添加对在属性窗口中绘制值的表示形式的额外支持：You can add additional support for painting a value's representation in the Properties window by performing the following steps: - 重写 方法以指示编辑器支持显示值的表示形式。Override the method to indicate that the editor supports displaying the value's representation. - 重写 方法以实现显示值的表示形式。Override the method to implement the display of the value's representation. - 如果编辑器应具有初始化行为，则重写构造函数方法。Override the constructor method if the editor should have initialization behavior. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持从右向左 (RTL) 布局。The class does not support right-to-left (RTL) layouts. 有关增强设计时支持的详细信息，请参阅 [扩展 Design-Time 支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100))。For more information about enhancing design-time support, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100)). 有关实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [用户界面类型编辑器概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f068b4ea-6e8c-4c0b-aefd-188b337240da)。For more information on implementing a , see [User Interface Type Editors Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f068b4ea-6e8c-4c0b-aefd-188b337240da). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用将与整数、双精度或 float 属性相关联， 以便在设计模式下从属性窗口提供角度选择接口。The following code example demonstrates that a can be associated with an integer, double, or float property using an to provide an angle selection interface from the Properties window in design mode. 此示例使用 接口在设计模式下的属性窗口中显示下拉控件。This example uses the interface to display a drop-down control in the Properties window in design mode. 编译代码，并使用 Visual Studio 的 "**工具**" 菜单上的 "**自定义工具箱**" 命令将程序集添加到工具箱中。Compile the code and add the assembly to the Toolbox using the **Customize Toolbox** command on the **Tools** menu of Visual Studio. 创建的实例 `AngleTestControl` ，然后单击 "属性窗口中" 角度 "属性旁边的下拉按钮，以使用编辑器来配置属性。Create an instance of the `AngleTestControl` and click the drop-down button next to the Angle property in the Properties window to configure the property using the editor. [!code-cpp[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/CPP/angleeditor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/CS/angleeditor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/VB/angleeditor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用 方法所指示的编辑器样式编辑指定对象的值。

span.span: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by the method.
The new value of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将启动用于值编辑的用户界面，并在用户尝试编辑此编辑器配置为编辑的值的类型的值时由属性窗口调用。This method launches the user interface for value editing, and is called by the Properties window when a user attempts to edit the value of a type that this editor is configured to edit the value of. 提供服务提供程序，以便编辑器可以获取任何所需的服务。A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.

summary.span: 使用指定的 绘制某个对象的值的表示形式。

span.span: Paints a representation of the value of an object using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑器应在指定矩形的边界内绘制。Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle. 此矩形指示要在其中绘制值的表示形式的属性窗口区域。This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within. 从 .NET Framework 4.6 开始， 当 app.config 文件包含以下项时，将根据系统 DPI 设置调整由指定的矩形的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the rectangle specified by will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑器应在指定矩形的边界内绘制。Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle. 此矩形指示要在其中绘制值的表示形式的属性窗口区域。This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within. 从 .NET Framework 4.6 开始， 当 app.config 文件包含以下项时，将根据系统 DPI 设置调整由指定的矩形的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the rectangle specified by will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ```
